{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05853v1", "title": "Notes on color reductions and $γ$ traces", "summary": "We present efficient algorithms to calculate the color factors for the
$SU(N)$ gauge group and to evaluate $\gamma$ traces. The aim of these notes is
to give a self-contained, proved account of the basic results with particular
emphasis on color reductions. We fine tune existing algorithms to make
calculations at high loop orders possible.", "main_category": "hep-ph", "categories": "hep-ph,hep-th,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-08T09:29:23Z"}
